name: Robot Point
description:
Robot point -In a vast galaxy. The evil robot empire has colonized the planets to make the emperor become the ruler of the galaxy.

but some of the human beings gathered to liberate the colony. 

You are a mercenary, The man with wall-breaking-plasma-gun, enemy-located-scanner, EMP-gun, and many more gadgets for challenging missions. 

  •  FPS strategy game
  • Various weapons and gadgets
  • There are 5 levels to choose from.

Sound & Music Credit

***This game will still have some bugs. We will fix it ASAP***.
